pages.title: Spurred Tortoise
pages.text: The African spurred tortoise ($(o)Centrochelys sulcata$()), also called the sulcata tortoise, is a species of tortoise inhabiting the southern edge of the Sahara desert in Africa.

pages.title: Spurred Tortoise
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:apple$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
